Discovery.bespoke_desc: Collaborate on a unique artifact designed exclusively for your narrative.
Discovery.pod_desc: Artisan prints and fine paper goods, crafted to turn your fleeting narratives into lasting artifacts.
Discovery.gallery_desc: A visual chronicle of the maker's journey—capturing the raw beauty of the craft through the lens.
Discovery.supplies_desc: Professional grade tools and rare materials, curated for the discerning artisan.

Bespoke.title: Bespoke Commissions
Bespoke.description: Collaborate with LaraCraft to create a custom artifact.

steps.two: Select your artisan material (Acrylic, Wood, Metal).

Footer.bio: Handmade gifts filled with heart and meaning. Based in Cologne, Germany.
